Uses of Interface
uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.videosurface.VideoSurfaceAdapter

  • Packages that use VideoSurfaceAdapter 
    Package Description
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.videosurface
    Provides the classes necessary to create user interface components that render native video.

    • Uses of VideoSurfaceAdapter in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.embedded.videosurface

      class  LinuxVideoSurfaceAdapter

      class  OsxVideoSurfaceAdapter
      Implementation of a video surface adapter for Mac.

      Implementation of a video surface adapter for Windows.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static VideoSurfaceAdapter VideoSurfaceAdapters.getVideoSurfaceAdapter()
